entry.title: H Stand For LED Work Lights
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: Accessories
Price: 38.99

There is an adjustable knob that allows you to rotate the light and meet more requirements.Use this adjustable H-bracket to mount your portable and flexible LED work light on.  The sturdy aluminum bracket is powder-coated for rust resistance, and hardware is included for mounting to your light.

entry.title: Construction Light Strings With Cage, 65W, 5000K, 8000 Lumens, IP65, Temporary LED Work Light, 50ft - 5 Lights Per Bunch
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: Work Light
Price: 157.95 - 600.21 (2 variants)

LED Work Lights are ideal lighting for construction sites as they provide very high lumens and are available with the cage that protects it from the wreckages in the site. These lights come in various configurations. These 65 W LED Work lights come with a CCT of 5000 K. These light fixtures are designed to endure and function in a voltage ranging between 100-277V. With a lumen output of 8000 Lumens, these LED Work Light Fixtures come with dust resistance. It's ETL, and IP65 certified that make them suitable for wet and damp locations. These light fixtures come with a lifespan of 50,000 hours and a manufacturer warranty of 3-years. These LED Work Lights are highly durable and are super-efficient that convert 95% of energy into light.
